valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 1 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Tue 2 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 959 moving steadily east expected just west of Rockall 968 by midnight tonight

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, southeasterly 6 to gale 8, becoming cyclonic 4 to 6. In east, southwesterly 4 to 6, backing southerly or southeasterly 6 to gale 8.
Sea state
In west, rough occasionally very rough. in east, moderate or rough becoming rough or very rough.
Weather
Rain.
Visibility
In west, good, occasionally poor. In east, moderate or poor.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
09:53 (UTC) on Sun 30 Nov 2025
Gale now ceased, but southeasterly gale force 8 expected later

Southeast Iceland.text:
Wind
In southeast, cyclonic mainly easterly, 7 to severe gale 9, decreasing 3 to 5 in south and later in north. In northwest, easterly backing northeasterly, 7 to severe gale 9, occasionally storm 10 later.
Sea state
Very rough or high.
Weather
In southeast, rain then showers. In northwest, rain.
Visibility
In southeast, good, occasionally poor. In northwest, poor.
